metadata.title: CVE-2020-8945 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: The proglottis Go wrapper before 0.1.1 for the GPGME library has ause-after-free, as demonstrated by use for container image pulls by Dockeror CRI-O. This leads to a crash or potential code execution during GPGsignature verification.

criterions.comment: singularity-container package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
